page.title: 14Coatham Youth Club
page.content: Coatham Youth Club has a 9-14 Club which many children in the area go to. The club is open on Mondays and Thursdays for 1\ hours. It costs 20p per session. In the Youth Club a number of facilities are provided - Table Tennis Pool, Snooker, Computers, Videos and a Disco. On Mondays a Break Dancing crew come to teach Break Dancing which is very popular. The Club organises a number of trips such as camping in the Lake District. There is a Snack Bar that is open every session where you can buy drinks crisps and sweets. As well as indoor activities, games such as football, cricket and netball can be played on a field behind the club. The club is very popular with the children.
